attributes.action: comment on the 265 rejected petitions relating to MP's expenses.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We request the Prime Minister to comment on the 265 rejected petitions relating to MP's expenses. Does he recognise the anger felt by all walks of the public on this issue? Will MP's collectively apologise for this fraudulent activity?

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
